title: Cruise Ship Navigation Simulation Training: Mobile-Based Science Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional Competency Enhancement Course for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers, Including Simulation-Based Teaching Method Experiences and Debriefing Skill Acquisition for Science Classes

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can apply navigation skills under strong wind conditions with 80% accuracy in a ship maneuvering simulation utilizing the Azipod propeller system
Learners can derive five or more optimal navigation strategies per situation by reflecting on simulation experiences in three or more debriefing sessions
Participants can recognize the visual limitations of simulation data in mobile environments and propose three educational approaches to address them

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
